no.title: Skeleton
no.subtitle: `Skeleton` brukes for 책 vise at innhold p책 en side er i ferd med 책 lastes inn. I stedet for 책 vise en [`Spinner`](/no/components/spinner/overview) som kun indikerer at noe skjer, kan `Skeleton` gi brukeren et visuelt hint om hvordan innholdet til slutt vil se ut.

en.title: Skeleton
en.subtitle: `Skeleton` is used to indicate that content on a page is loading. Instead of showing a [`Spinner`](/en/components/spinner/overview) that only indicates that something is happening, `Skeleton` provides the user with a visual hint of what the content will eventually look like.
